website_summaries.verdict: The good outweighs the bad for the New Balance 4040v4 Turf shoe. It delivers lightweight comfort, style, and traction. There seems to be not that much risk when a customer buys this shoe.
pros: The New Balance 4040v4 Turf baseball shoe delivers a comfortable fit, disclosed majority of the commenters
A considerable number of customers found the shoe to have a lightweight feel
A handful of users discovered that the pair brings good traction and grip in turf grounds
Some shoppers highly appreciated the shoe’s overall look
Several buyers liked this turf shoe’s overall fit
A couple of patrons revealed that they have been buying this New Balance baseball shoe model for years - and they plan to continue doing so
One player raved about the shoe’s gusseted tongue construction
Another reviewer says that the pair does not feel stiff
cons: Several commenters say that the shoe has a narrow fit
A couple more reviewers mentioned that there is an annoying click when using their pair

customer_reviews.title: Wow, way too tight
customer_reviews.text: The size on these shoes appears to be off by about a full size. I'm a 10-10.5 for every shoe I'm had for 25 years and I bought 10.5 size for these shoes. But they are so tight and uncomfortable, especially in the toe box. I'm a bit shocked how far they are off. That's what I get for buying shoes sight-unseen from Amazon. Shame on you New Balance for having your sizes so far off than every other shoe manufacturer...
customer_reviews.author: Chris K.

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed with these shoes! When they arrived the shoe box was completely destroyed. The shoes also look like they have be worn already by the dirt marks shown in the pictures I posted. Mind blown that a company would even ship these to someone. NOT A HAPPY CUSTOMER
customer_reviews.author: Kevin & Katelyn Kady

customer_reviews.title: SIZING
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe but I needed a 4E and this Model it only came in a 2E and, length was a little snug compared to other NB sneakers I have worn over many years.... I suppose if you have a normal fit foot size, you should be fine, put personally, I would go up 1/2 size, just saying...
customer_reviews.author: ed waesche

customer_reviews.title: Another Great Pair of NB Turf Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes as always with NB. Also like the style and utility of the turf shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne Oldfield

customer_reviews.title: Great for everyone!
customer_reviews.text: My husband plays softball and has a bad ankle and wore regular cleats. He finally gave these a shot and LOVES them! Great shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Tawnya

customer_reviews.title: Shoe doesn't fit like a true size 10
customer_reviews.text: The product looked like the picture. I received it in the quoted time frame
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe, but run small
customer_reviews.text: I like New Balance shoes and have had good service from them. I do feel as though they have changed their sizing. These are a little tighter than I would like, but so far they are holding up well and have good grip. I would get at least a half size larger than you normally would.
customer_reviews.author: American

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves these shoes we are on the second pair.
customer_reviews.author: kim Picetti

customer_reviews.title: OUTSTANDING
customer_reviews.text: These shoes can be described in one word.....OUTSTANDING. If you need some football referee shoes you need to get these shoes ASAP!
customer_reviews.author: Heath

customer_reviews.title: Great, comfortable pair of turfs!
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of turfs. I ordered a size larger than my normal after reading some of the reviews on here. Fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: fitnessdave

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes. Comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. Comfortable and stylish. THEY RUN AT LEAST (1) ONE FULL SIZE SMALL. I wear 9.5-10 in every shoe I've ever purchased. Had to return these 10's for a size 11.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bet fitting turf shoe so far
customer_reviews.text: the good part about this shoe is that the area above the toe box is made with mesh material which provides the much needed flexibility in that region.
customer_reviews.author: DanLan

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable out of the box
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable out of the box. I wore them in a softball tournament the same day I opened them and they were comfortable all day long. I recomend ordering a size bigger because they run a little small. love the design and the wide toe box. They offer perfect grip in the infield and outfield on a dry day.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Holtquist

customer_reviews.title: so far they have been great. I've only had them for 2 weeks so ...
customer_reviews.text: They are my 1st pair of NB's, so far they have been great. I've only had them for 2 weeks so time will tell, they are very comfortable and I haven't had any slippage issues running the bases with them. I would have given a 5 star but it's too early and I had to send the 1st pair back because the sizing ran small, so I had to order a half size up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs small and narrow
customer_reviews.text: These were decent shoes, however they run small and narrow.
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: I like the shoes otherwise it running smaller that my other ...
customer_reviews.text: 1/2 size to small and tight I ordered another pair a ha1/2 size bigger in a wide. Shipping was prompt! I like the shoes otherwise it running smaller that my other New Balance Shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Birthday Gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my husband for his birthday and he loved them and so did I.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used these a lot for a year or more and they’re still in great shape
customer_reviews.author: John SMith

customer_reviews.title: Shoe Falls Apart
customer_reviews.text: Shoe fell apart after using two times. Looks good and is comfortable, but it should be more durable. Fell apart after wearing twice.
customer_reviews.author: Josh S

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great for turf and indoor throwing! If you’re training indoor on a rubber and/or turf mound the stick is perfect
customer_reviews.author: DARIO POLANCO

customer_reviews.title: Had to return and get a wide
customer_reviews.text: Had to return to get a wide, excellent besides that.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel McNally

customer_reviews.title: Still small but not so bad after it stretched out
customer_reviews.text: Runs a half size small but stretched out a little. Still small but not so bad after it stretched out.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Eads

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and light weight for a turf shoe
customer_reviews.text: Fits true to size. Comfortable and light weight for a turf shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like the look and fit but they are giving me ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the look and fit but they are giving me some wicked blisters on my heals as I break them in.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kendall

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: very stable shoe, even usable on the golf course. Although 2E they do not fit as wide as anticipated
customer_reviews.author: Jim

product_meta.title: New Balance 4040v4 Turf, Men’s T4040v4 Turf
